DataElement.preferredName: Patient Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Current Medical Status Description 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated description of their current health and disease status, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire Current Medical Status Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care._A question about a person's description of the patient's current medical status._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Patient Version Prognosis Treatment and Perceptions Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A 13-item questionnaire used to assess information preferences, perceptions of prognosis and goal of therapy, and communication about end-of-life care.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's description of the patient's current medical status.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's description of the patient's current medical status.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PTPQ:Prognosis and Treatment Perceptions Questionnaire as referenced in Associations Among Prognostic Understanding, Quality of Life, El-Jawahri A, et.al., 2014
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 5/28/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard with four text responses related to an individual's medical status from relatively healthy to seriously ill and teminally ill.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be in seriously poor health and also terminally ill.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be in seriously poor health and also terminally ill.

PermissibleValues.value: Seriously ill and not terminally ill
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Seriously Ill and Not Terminally Ill

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Seriously Ill and Not Terminally Ill
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be in seriously poor health but not terminally ill.

Concepts.longName: Seriously Ill and Not Terminally Ill
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be in seriously poor health but not terminally ill.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be of fairly good health but also terminally ill.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be of fairly good health but also terminally ill.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be of fairly good health.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual considers themselves to be of fairly good health.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
